verses.name: 1 Chronicles 14:11
verses.text: So they came up to Baal–perazim; and David smote them there. Then David said, God hath broken in upon mine enemies by mine hand like the breaking forth of waters: therefore they called the name of that place Baal–perazim.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 14:12
verses.text: And when they had left their gods there, David gave a commandment, and they were burned with fire.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 14:13
verses.text: And the Philistines yet again spread themselves abroad in the valley.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 14:14
verses.text: Therefore David enquired again of God; and God said unto him, Go not up after them; turn away from them, and come upon them over against the mulberry trees.
